abstract.p: Casual Corner Group opens Petite Sophisticate, Casual Corner and August Max Woman apparel shops on site of former Woolworth's on Third Avenue between East 41st and 42nd Streets (New Yorkers & Co column) (S)

block.p: Three clothing stores for professional women opened last month on the site of the former Woolworth's on Third Avenue between East 41st and 42nd Streets. The stores offer many similar styles and are owned by the Casual Corner Group of Enfield, Conn. At the corner of 42nd Street is Petite Sophisticate, which offers outfits designed for the working woman in sizes 0 to 14. At the middle of the block is Casual Corner, for sizes 2 to 14, and August Max Woman, for sizes 14 to 26.

''To us that is the perfect location for our store,'' said Mark Shulman, chief operating officer of the Casual Corner Group. ''It's exactly where our customer is. She's living in those office buildings.''
